altTitles.ja-ro: Junjou Sky High: Koi no LSD

altTitles.en: Long Slow Distance Love: Sky High Innocence

description.en:
1. No! Smokin' Boogie (No Smoking Room)  
A quaint office story about a woman that's attracted to the smell of cigarettes, and hooks up with an older man, leading to pleasant results.  
2. Melancholic Serenade  
About a man whose lover also works at his company, but shes much younger and more successful than him. He begins to get jealous, and then…  
3. Junjou Sky High: Koi no LSD (Long Slow Distance Love: Sky High Innocence)  
An athletic woman and the man she admires, but who won't pay her enough attention. Finally she gets her chance.  
4. 5-ji kara Honban! (After Five Working!)  
The eponymous chapter of this book, and follows an office worker while she goes to her other job after hours as a bathhouse girl, where she runs into one of her co-workers. Much sweetness ensues.  
5. Blue: Sayonara Natsu no Hi  
A woman engaged to be married (with doubts) visiting her very rural hometown and running into an old flame. Nice and bittersweet.  
6. Glass no Kutsu no Rhapsody (Rhapsody of Glass Shoes)  
The executive of a company who suffers a fall, but all he remembers is seeing a woman with the ideal legs, and all he has to remember her by is her shoe.  
7. Sanmon Bunshi no Koi (Hack Writer Love)  
A hack writer who visits a local rare books store after it was closed for so long, only to find that only the proprietor's daughter remains.  
8. Itazura na Datenshi (Naughty Fallen Angel)  
A guy who ends up at a hospital where a nurse is an old, but mischievous friend.  
  
Link:
